amendatorysection.catchline: Pool hall; bowling alley; operation without license; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: No person hereafter shall conduct or operate any pool or billiard hall or bowling alley outside the limits of any incorporated city or village without having first obtained a license from the county board of the county in which the same is to be operated. Any person, corporation or association violating the provisions of this section shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor. Every day in which the pool or billiard hall or bowling alley shall be operated without said license shall constitute a new offense.
